Dist.Wiki: Do not throw unless the distance is closer than this value [m]

DiffAngMin.Wiki: If the angle difference (Y-axis) between the throwing side and the receiving side is not larger than this angle, it will not be thrown.

DiffAngMax.Wiki: If the angle difference (Y-axis) between the throwing side and the receiving side is smaller than this angle, it will not be thrown.

upperYRange.Wiki: Do not throw unless the relative distance of the Y axis from the throwing side to the receiving side is smaller than this value

lowerYRange.Wiki: Do not throw unless the relative distance of the Y axis from the throwing side to the receiving side is smaller than this value

diffAngMyToDef.Wiki: The angle difference between the vector in front of you and the vector in the direction from you to the other party. If it is larger than this value, it will not be thrown

throwTypeId.Wiki: ID that identifies the type of throw (association with attack parameter)

atkAnimId.Wiki: Set attack animation ID (linked to EzState)

defAnimId.Wiki: Set damage animation ID (linked to EzState)

escHp.Wiki: Value that can withstand throwing through

sphereCastRadiusRateTop.Wiki: Ratio of upper radius of sphere cast [80-> 0.8]

AtkEnableState.Wiki: Please set the state type that can be thrown on the throwing side

throwFollowingType.Wiki: How to follow the character possessed by Adsorbed Damipoli while throwing. * Follow-up period is controlled by TAE action

dmyHasChrDirType.AltName: Character Throw - Dummy Poly Direction Type
dmyHasChrDirType.Wiki: Direction of Damipoli possession character when throwing occurs

isSkipWepCate.Wiki: Do you want to skip the attacker's weapon category check?

isSkipSphereCast.Wiki: Do you want to skip the sphere cast?

isEnableCorrectPos_forThrowAdjust.AltName: Enable Correct Position for Throw Adjustment
isEnableCorrectPos_forThrowAdjust.Wiki: If it is set to , the location of the throwing position will be the position of the adsorption Damipoli that has returned to the positional relationship equivalent to the flat ground.

isEnableThrowFollowingFallAssist.Wiki: Is the same treatment as the wall removal prevention applied to the fall prevention wall so that it does not fall from the step when the follow-up is released?

isEnableThrowFollowingFeedback.Wiki: Do you want to return the character with the Adsorbed Damipoli when it comes in contact with a hit or fall prevention wall so that it does not look like it will get stuck in the middle wall or fall from a step?

atkSorbDmyId.Wiki: Where on the throwing side should the receiving side be attracted?

defSorbDmyId.Wiki: Where on the receiving side should the throwing side be adsorbed?

Dist_start.Wiki: Only throw at a distance closer than this value [m] Used for throwing at the start of the Backstab

DiffAngMin_start.Wiki: If the angle difference (Y-axis) between the throwing side and the receiving side is not larger than this angle, it will not be thrown. It is used for throwing at the start of the Backstab.

DiffAngMax_start.Wiki: The angle difference (Y-axis) between the throwing side and the receiving side must be smaller than this angle to throw. Used for throwing at the start of the Backstab.

upperYRange_start.Wiki: It will not be thrown unless the relative distance of the Y axis from the throwing side to the receiving side is smaller than this value. It is used for throwing at the start of the Backstab.

lowerYRange_start.Wiki: It will not be thrown unless the relative distance of the Y axis from the throwing side to the receiving side is smaller than this value. It is used for throwing at the start of the Backstab.

diffAngMyToDef_start.Wiki: The angle difference between the vector in front of you and the vector in the direction from you to the other party. If it is larger than this value, it will not be thrown. It will be used for throwing at the start of the Backstab.

judgeRangeBasePosDmyId1.AltName: Attacker - Throwing Range Judgment - Dummy Poly ID
judgeRangeBasePosDmyId1.Wiki: Damipoli that the thrower considers to be his position when calculating the throw range. If -1, the capsule origin

judgeRangeBasePosDmyId2.AltName: Defender - Throwing Range Judgment - Dummy Poly ID
judgeRangeBasePosDmyId2.Wiki: Damipoli that the thrower considers to be his position when calculating the throw range. If -1, the capsule origin

adsrobModelPosInterpolationTime.Wiki: After the capsule is adsorbed on Damipoli, the time it takes for the character model to interpolate and move to the position according to the throwing animation data (when 0 is set, the model position is not interpolated and playback starts immediately after adsorption with the positional relationship according to the animation data. Will be)

throwFollowingEndEasingTime.Wiki: Model position interpolation time at the end of tracking
